java/liquibase/database/structure/PrimaryKey.java

00001 package liquibase.database.structure;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00004 
00005 import java.util.ArrayList;
00006 import java.util.List;
00007 
00008 public class PrimaryKey implements DatabaseObject, Comparable<PrimaryKey> {
00009     private String name;
00010     private List<String> columnNames = new ArrayList<String>();
00011     private Table table;
00012     private boolean certainName = true;
00013 
00014 
00015     public String getName() {
00016         return name;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public void setName(String name) {
00020         this.name = name;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public String getColumnNames() {
00024         return StringUtils.join(columnNames, ", ");
00025     }
00026 
00027     public void addColumnName(int position, String columnName) {
00028         if (position >= columnNames.size()) {
00029             for (int i = columnNames.size()-1; i < position; i++) {
00030                 this.columnNames.add(null);
00031             }
00032         }
00033         this.columnNames.set(position, columnName);
00034     }
00035 
00036     public Table getTable() {
00037         return table;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void setTable(Table table) {
00041         this.table = table;
00042     }
00043 
00044 
00045     public int compareTo(PrimaryKey o) {
00046         int returnValue = this.getTable().getName().compareTo(o.getTable().getName());
00047         if (returnValue == 0) {
00048             returnValue = this.getColumnNames().compareTo(o.getColumnNames());
00049         }
00050 //        if (returnValue == 0) {
00051 //            returnValue = this.getName().compareTo(o.getName());
00052 //        }
00053 
00054         return returnValue;
00055     }
00056 
00057 
00058     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00059         if (this == o) return true;
00060         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00061 
00062         PrimaryKey that = (PrimaryKey) o;
00063 
00064         return !(getColumnNames() != null ? !getColumnNames().equalsIgnoreCase(that.getColumnNames()) : that.getColumnNames() != null) && !(getTable().getName() != null ? !getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(that.getTable().getName()) : that.getTable().getName() != null);
00065 
00066     }
00067 
00068     public int hashCode() {
00069         int result;
00070         result = (getColumnNames() != null ? getColumnNames().toUpperCase().hashCode() : 0);
00071         result = 31 * result + (table.getName() != null ? table.getName().toUpperCase().hashCode() : 0);
00072         return result;
00073     }
00074 
00075     public String toString() {
00076         return getName() + " on " + getTable().getName() + "(" + getColumnNames() + ")";
00077     }
00078 
00079     public List<String> getColumnNamesAsList() {
00080         return columnNames;
00081     }
00082 
00083     public boolean isCertainName() {
00084         return certainName;
00085     }
00086 
00087     public void setCertainName(boolean certainName) {
00088         this.certainName = certainName;
00089     }
00090 }
